solution: Adding real parts and imaginary parts separately, we have $(2-(-4)+0+2)+(1+0-1+4)i=\boxed{8+4i}$.
model_solution:
Step 1:  Substitute the given values of A, O, P, and S into the expression A - O + P + S.
$A-O+P+S=(2+i)-(-4)+(-i)+(2+4i)$
Step 2: $A-O+P+S=(2+i)-(-4)+(-i)+(2+4i)=(2+i+4-1)+(2+4i)$
Step 3: $A-O+P+S=(2+i+4-1)+(2+4i)=(5+i)+(2+4i)=(5+2)+(i+4i)=7+5i$
Step 4: $A-O+P+S=7+5i$
$A-O+P+S=7+5i$
Step 5: $A-O+P+S=7+5i$
$A-O+P+S=7+5i$
$A-O+P+S=7+5i$
Step 6: $A-O+P+S=7+5i$
